About Us

the bullets

Who We Are?

The Sujeeth Foundation is a non-profit organization dedicated to unlocking the opportunity of education.

What We Do?

We provides scholarships and services to college students pursuing a STEM degree or graduate studies.

Why We Do It?

Academic institutions are a place where experimentation thrives and opportunities to grow are abundant. We want to unlock that value.

Since When?

We launched on May 2023. We plan to award our first scholarship this year.

Blog

Our latest posts

The Sujeeth Foundation starts today

This is the origin story of the Sujeeth Foundation. The mission is to unlock the opportunity of education. The foundation provides scholarships to college students pursuing a STEM degree or graduate studies. Scholarships are awarded based on Grit scores. All applicants can take advantage of provided growth mindset training and other services.
